FuncDef: The display multicast-profile command displays information about all multicast profiles or a specified one.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an IPv6 multicast profile.
-

Specifies the name of a multicast profile.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check information about all multicast profiles or a specified one, run the display multicast-profile command.
If the parameter profile-name is not specified, information about all multicast profiles is displayed.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
